column2: They'll all meet their end in the sights of my scope.
Is that not how we all meet our ends? For all we not all fixed in the scope of life?
It's how you're all going to end if we don't move out of the damn fire.
It's time to move now. We group for a fight.
I'm nary inclined to disagree with that notion.
I said we hold our positions.
We've got each other either way.
That's the spirit! We route them with our fighting skills for sure!
These interstellar cephalopods are 90% liquid, like a watermelon. Most of that liquid is highly corrosive to the touch.
Touching or ingesting these excretions is neither recommended, or encouraged, by the Republic
The ichor flows as the passage of time, a blemish until all is extinguished.
...it also notably can have hallucinogenic properties.
This is no hallucination. This is divination. For I speak as I have been shown by those nor bound by our fragile mortal coil.
The watermelon? My son is quite the fan of watermelon, you know.
